Format commit messages exactly like this:

[Action using Conventional Commits (ADD:, UPDATE:, FEAT:)] : Small description if needed
- Bullet Point 1
- Bullet Point 2
- Bullet Point 3

Rules:
- First line must be: [Action] : <short description>
- Use 3â€“8 bullets
- Bullets must use imperative verbs (Add, Update, Refactor, Fix, Remove, Improve, Implement)

- No extra paragraphs
- No trailing punctuation on bullets
